channel.title: machine learning on Don't Blame The Data
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Don't Blame The Data

item.title: Building a Linear Regression Model in R to Predict AFL Crowds
item.description: Introduction There is a lot of talk about crowd behaviour and crowd issues with the modern day AFL. I personally feel the crowd issues are a case of business-as-usual; I’ve been going to AFL games on-and-off for close to three decades and the crowd behaviour is no different today as it was 20 years ago… just now everyone with a phone and Twitter account is a journo. Anyway, that’s my two cents worth.
